channel.title: Spawning objects, in code and in game?
channel.description: Ok, how do i spawn objects. Firstly i need to find out in code, like spawning npc in autospawn.cfg or spawning items in drops.cfg. Where and how do i spawn objects in code? And secondly i need it in code for ingame like ::pickup itemid amount or ::npc npcid. :confused: :| :confused:

item.title: Spawning objects, in code and in game?
item.dc:creator: @ganonluvesu ganonluvesu
item.description:
@ganonluvesu wrote:

Dude lol i want to spawn objects, i kno the codes, i want to spawn them.

Read full topic
item.source: Spawning objects, in code and in game?

item.title: Spawning objects, in code and in game?
item.dc:creator: @fireshadow299 fireshadow299
item.description:
@fireshadow299 wrote:

ok goto help in right hand corner of moparscape then it will say
item ids npc ids and object ids and its already in game you dont need to add ne codes you just type ::pickup 0995 1000000000 or ::npc 1450
hope this helps

Read full topic
